steps.notes: Crush and grind coarse regolith to powder
Extract oxygen and produce metal byproduct via MRE

recipe_def.assumptions: Co-product metal alloy from MRE; refining not modeled.
520 kg reduction furnace shell with refractory lining.
recipe_def.notes: Four-step recipe for reduction furnace shell.

steps.notes: Cast pipe sections, valve bodies, blower housing
Machine valve seats and flange faces
Assemble system with valves and blower

recipe_def.assumptions: 140 kg gas handling system for reduction furnace gas loop.
recipe_def.notes: Four-step recipe for gas handling system.

steps.notes: Machine connection holes and mounting surfaces
Assemble bus with insulators and connectors

recipe_def.assumptions: 50 kg high-current bus for furnace/reactor power distribution.
recipe_def.notes: Three-step recipe for high-current power bus.

steps.notes: Form regolith-based insulation into panels/blankets and kit into a high-temp pack.

recipe_def.assumptions: Regolith-based insulation can be formed into high-temperature panels with adequate thermal performance.
recipe_def.notes: Local alternative to ceramic fiber-based insulation pack using regolith-derived insulation.
recipe_def.name: High-temp insulation pack from regolith-based insulation

recipe_def.assumptions: Assemble per BOM; parts produced via part-level routes.
recipe_def.notes: Coarse assembly route; add detailed steps later.
